label: applicablePeriod
comment: A period applicable to this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The period applicable for this supply chain supply plan.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of formal steps to satisfy a regulation, law or convention.
Specification of the delivery time and quantity bucket in a demand forecast or supply schedule.
